entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
